input2:
CC: breath and cough x 5 days
HPI: presenting with URI symptoms sneezing and coughing productive of white sputum 5 days -. "It felt like a plug". No prior diagnosis of COPD or asthma, does not use home O2 or home inhalers. Received an albuterol neb in ambulance for O2 saturation of 88% on RA with improvement. No fever/chills, used to smoke half a pack a day but quit in the, no sick contacts. Endorses whole body myalgias as well.
﻿
